styles.container: max-width: 700px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 24px 20px 70px 20px; font-family: "Crimson Text", Garamond, serif; font-size: 19px; line-height: 1.75 !important; color: #2c2c2c !important; background-color: #fffef9 !important; word-wrap: break-word;

h1.base: font-size: 52px; font-weight: 400; color: #c9302c !important; line-height: 1.15 !important; margin: 70px 0 35px; letter-spacing: -0.03em; font-family: "Bodoni MT", "Didot", serif; text-align: center;

h2.base: font-size: 38px; font-weight: 400; color: #2c2c2c !important; line-height: 1.25 !important; margin: 60px 0 30px; letter-spacing: -0.02em; font-family: "Bodoni MT", "Didot", serif; border-top: 1px solid #c9302c; border-bottom: 1px solid #c9302c; padding: 15px 0; text-align: center;

h3.base: font-size: 30px; font-weight: 400; color: #2c2c2c !important; line-height: 1.35 !important; margin: 50px 0 25px; font-family: "Bodoni MT", "Didot", serif;

base.base: font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color: #2c2c2c !important; line-height: 1.4 !important; margin: 40px 0 20px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.05em; font-size: 18px;

code.block: margin: 40px 0; padding: 30px; background-color: #f9f9f9 !important; border-left: 5px solid #c9302c; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 1.6 !important;
code.inline: font-family: "Courier Prime", monospace; font-size: 17px; padding: 2px 6px; background-color: #f9f9f9 !important; color: #c9302c !important; border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;

styles.quote: margin: 32px 0; padding: 0 32px; background-color: transparent !important; border-left: none; color: #2c2c2c !important; font-size: 20px; line-height: 1.5 !important; font-style: italic; text-align: center; font-family: "Bodoni MT", "Didot", serif;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; max-height: 600px !important; height: auto; display: block; margin: 45px auto; border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;

table.header: background-color: #f9f9f9 !important; padding: 15px; text-align: left; border-top: 2px solid #c9302c; border-bottom: 2px solid #c9302c; font-weight: 700; color: #2c2c2c !important; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.05em; font-size: 14px;

styles.hr: margin: 70px auto; border: none; height: 1px; background-color: #c9302c !important; max-width: 100px;
